name: De Vere Village Swindon

reviews.text: I stayed at this hotel on two occaisions in 2004. Both stays were extremely pleasant and the rooms and food were great. The food in the restaurant was excellent though the service could be improved.
reviews.title: Nice rooms, nice food, location could be better

reviews.text: The hotel location is a bit out of the way limiting alternative options for eating/drinking. Mind you, who would want to stay in Swindon town centre anyway?
reviews.title: Perfect night away!

aka: De Vere Village Swindon Hotel Swindon
